attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A SIMPLE Referendum to make it easier for the not so literate to understand.

Do YOU want Britain to stay in the European Union and RULE Britain or do you want to come out and let BRITAIN BE FREE?

Please tick YES......or NO.

Thank you Violet Foot.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
